Class Seller

  • java.lang.Object
    • User
      • Seller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SellerADT, UserADT

    public class Seller
extends User
implements SellerADT
    This class implements SellerADT and extends User class. In addition this class defines required fields and defines methods for adding/removing items from the sell list.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kyle Aure and Johnny Tran

        public Seller()

      • Seller

        public Seller(java.util.ArrayList<Item> sellList,
              User user)
        Constructor that accepts a sell list and an existing user. This constructor should be used to turn an existing user into a seller.
        Parameters:
        sellList - ArrayList of items to sell.
        user - object of user class.

        Description copied from interface: SellerADT
        Moves an item from purchase list to sell list
        Specified by:
        addItemToSell in interface SellerADT
        Parameters:
